text:
January 26, 1959
Mrs. Gertrude G. Broderick
U. S. Office of Education
Washington, D. C.
Dear Gertrude:
Thank you, very much. It is a tough one, but your title is the best
I've heard so far. Knowing how busy you are â€” sincere thanks.
Talking to Walter Stone here later today (Saturday) of procedures
for our proposals and grants.
Our best.
hjs:rs
Harry J. Skomia
Executive Director
